channel.title: itlp on Mark A. Matienzo
channel.description: Recent content in itlp on Mark A. Matienzo

item.title: What one says and does not say: vulnerability, leadership, and professional trajectories
item.description: I don’t say this lightly: participating in ITLP has been transformative for me. I’ve learned a lot through the readings, workshops, and applied learning aspects, but honestly, the most valuable aspects have been individual development and participation in a leadership community. I’m not entirely sure why these two things go hand in hand for me, but I believe that it has something to do with the support I’ve felt from all of everyone, both the instructors and cohort participants, throughout the program.

item.title: Notes on ITLP Workshop 1 readings
item.description: I completed my reading and viewing assignments for my cohort’s __IT Leadership Program Workshop 1__{:.p-name} (January 9-January 11 at UC Berkeley.) This is a brief set of notes for my own use about how all of them tie together.
